00152   public function init()
00153   {
00154     //  Call daddy...
00155     parent::init();
00156 
00157     //  Attach our events...
00158     $this->attachEventHandler( 'onBeforeApiCall', array( $this, 'beforeApiCall' ) );
00159     $this->attachEventHandler( 'onAfterApiCall', array( $this, 'afterApiCall' ) );
00160     $this->attachEventHandler( 'onRequestComplete', array( $this, 'requestComplete' ) );
00161   }

00180   public function addRequestMapping( $label, $parameterName = null, $required = false, $options = array( ), $apiName = null, $subApiName = null )
00181   {
00182     //  Save for next call
00183     static $_lastApiName;
00184     static $_lastAction;
00185 
00186     //  Set up statics so next call can omit those parameters.
00187     if ( null !== $apiName && $apiName != $_lastApiName )
00188       $_lastApiName = $apiName;
00189 
00190     //  Make sure sub API name is set...
00191     if ( null === $_lastAction && null == $subApiName )
00192       $subApiName = '/';
00193 
00194     if ( null !== $subApiName && $subApiName != $_lastAction )
00195       $_lastAction = $subApiName;
00196 
00197     //  Build the options
00198     $_mapOptions = array(
00199       'name' => ( null !== $parameterName ) ? $parameterName : $label,
00200       'required' => $required
00201     );
00202 
00203     //  Add on any supplied options
00204     if ( !empty( $options ) )
00205       $_mapOptions = array_merge( $_mapOptions, $options );
00206 
00207     //  Add the mapping...
00208     if ( null == $_lastApiName && null == $_lastAction )
00209       return false;
00210 
00211     //  Add mapping...
00212     if ( null === $this->_requestMap )
00213       $this->_requestMap = array( );
00214 
00215     $this->_requestMap[ $_lastApiName ][ $_lastAction ][ $label ] = $_mapOptions;
00216 
00217     return true;
00218   }
00219 
00227   protected function makeRequest( $subType = '/', $requestData = null, $requestMethod = 'GET' )
00228   {
00229     //  Make sure apiQueryName is set...
00230     if ( $this->_requireApiQueryName && null === $this->_apiQueryName )
00231     {
00232       throw new CXLApiException(
00233         Yii::t(
00234           __CLASS__, 'Required option "apiQueryName" is not set.'
00235         )
00236       );
00237     }
00238 
00239     //  Default...
00240     $_payload = $this->_requestData;
00241 
00242     //  Check data...
00243     if ( is_array( $requestData ) && !empty( $requestData ) )
00244       $_payload = array_merge( $_payload, $requestData );
00245 
00246     //  Check subtype...
00247     if ( !empty( $subType ) && is_array( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00248     {
00249       if ( !array_key_exists( $subType, $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00250       {
00251         throw new CXLApiException(
00252           Yii::t(
00253             __CLASS__, 'Invalid API SubType specified for "{apiToUse}". Valid subtypes are "{subTypes}"', array(
00254             '{apiToUse}' => $this->_apiToUse,
00255             '{subTypes}' => implode( ', ', array_keys( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00256             )
00257           )
00258         );
00259       }
00260     }
00261 
00262     //  Build the url...
00263     $_url = rtrim( $this->_apiBaseUrl, '/' ) . '/';
00264 
00265     if ( isset( $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) && '/' != $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ] )
00266       $_url .= $this->_apiSubUrls[ $this->_apiToUse ];
00267 
00268     //  Add the API key...
00269     if ( $this->_requireApiQueryName )
00270       $_queryString = $this->_apiQueryName . '=' . $this->_apiKey;
00271 
00272     //  Add the request data to the Url...
00273     if ( is_array( $this->_requestMap ) && !empty( $subType ) && isset( $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ] ) )
00274     {
00275       $_requestMap = $this->_requestMap[ $this->_apiToUse ][ $subType ];
00276       $_result = array( );
00277 
00278       //  Add any extra requestData parameters unchecked to the query string...
00279       foreach ( $_payload as $_key => $_value )
00280       {
00281         if ( !array_key_exists( $_key, $_requestMap ) )
00282         {
00283           $_queryString .= '&' . $_key . '=' . urlencode( $_value );
00284           unset( $_payload[ $_key ] );
00285         }
00286       }
00287 
00288       //  Now build the url...
00289       foreach ( $_requestMap as $_key => $_mapping )
00290       {
00291         //  Tag as done...
00292         $_result[] = $_key;
00293 
00294         //  Is there a default value?
00295         if ( isset( $_mapping[ 'default' ] ) && !isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00296           $_payload[ $_key ] = $_mapping[ 'default' ];
00297 
00298         if ( isset( $_mapping['required'] ) && $_mapping['required'] && !array_key_exists( $_key, $_payload ) )
00299         {
00300           throw new CXLApiException(
00301             Yii::t(
00302               __CLASS__, 'Required parameter {param} was not included in requestData', array(
00303               '{param}' => $_key,
00304               )
00305             )
00306           );
00307         }
00308 
00309         //  Add to query string
00310         if ( isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00311           $_queryString .= '&' . $_mapping[ 'name' ] . '=' . urlencode( $_payload[ $_key ] );
00312       }
00313     }
00314     //  Handle non-requestMap call...
00315     else if ( is_array( $_payload ) )
00316     {
00317       foreach ( $_payload as $_key => $_value )
00318       {
00319         if ( isset( $_payload[ $_key ] ) )
00320           $_queryString .= '&' . $_key . '=' . urlencode( $_value );
00321       }
00322     }
00323 
00324     if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00325       XL::logDebug( 'Calling onBeforeApiCall', self::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00326 
00327     //  Handle events...
00328     $_event = new CXLApiEvent( $_url, $_queryString, null, $this );
00329     $this->onBeforeApiCall( $_event );
00330 
00331     if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00332       XL::logDebug( 'Making request: ' . $_queryString, self::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00333 
00334     //  Ok, we've build our request, now let's get the results...
00335     $_response = PS::makeHttpRequest( $_url, $_queryString, $requestMethod, $this->_userAgent );
00336 
00337     if ( $this->_debugLevel > 3 )
00338       XL::logDebug( 'Call complete', self::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00339 
00340     if ( $this->_debugLevel > 4 )
00341       XL::logDebug( 'Response: ' . var_export( $_response, true ), self::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00342 
00343     //  Handle events...
00344     $_event->setUrlResults( $_response );
00345     $this->onAfterApiCall( $_event );
00346 
00347     //  If user doesn't want JSON output, then reformat
00348     switch ( $this->_returnFormat )
00349     {
00350       case PS::OF_XML:
00351         $_response = CXLTransform::arrayToXml( json_decode( $_response, true ), 'Results' );
00352         break;
00353 
00354       case PS::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY:
00355         $_response = json_decode( $_response, true );
00356         break;
00357 
00358       default: // Naked
00359         break;
00360     }
00361 
00362     //  Raise our completion event...
00363     $_event->setUrlResults( $_response );
00364     $this->onRequestComplete( $_event );
00365 
00366     //  Return results...
00367     return $_response;
00368   }
